recommendations: Nishant Raut ‚ÄúAnkit is is excellent product manager and have all skills needed to be a good product manager. I am personally mentored by Ankit when I was looking for a transition from developer role to Product Manager role. he guidance helped to built interview preparations very well. I highly recommend him to get guidance to clear the product management interviews and he will be a great part of any team and will add value to the organization.‚Äù

Nikita Agarwal ‚ÄúAnkit and I worked together at Indeed. He owned the Indeed India Increase Number of Jobs KR. He had a team of 8 engineers, he utilised them well with large long-term initiatives and small quick wins. He had a clear vision on how to make the product succeed in 3 years. He had a roadmap and milestones for each year and each quarter on what KRs to target, what initiatives are required and how marketing will move the KRs. He analysed the competitors and took big-bets that were long needed. He balanced the resources between strategic initiatives and big bets. It was a pleasure working with him, he kept the team morale high, the team believed in his vision and he always kept room for new ideas.‚Äù
projects: [{"title":"Factors Affecting Customer Engagement in Shopping Mall when using SoLoMo applications (Singapore)","start_date":"Apr 2012","description":"Studied the drivers of customer engagement in a shopping mall using SoLoMo based applications through a systematic approach using interviews, observations, literary and quantitative research."},{},{},{},{"title":"Strategic Analysis of Customer Satisfaction at UAE Exchange","start_date":"Nov 2012","end_date":"Mar 2013","description":"Conduct a 'Customer Satisfaction Survey' of members of the loyalty program ‚ÄòClub Exclusive‚Äô of Dubai based exchange house 'UAE Exchange' and undertake a analysis of the findings to recommend strategies to add value to the current ‚ÄòClub Exclusive‚Äô membership proposition."},{},{},{},{"title":"Factors affecting the customer engagement in a shopping mall through SoLoMo applications","start_date":"May 2012","end_date":"Sep 2012","description":"SoLoMo refers to the next generation of mobile marketing. It is the convergence of Social , Local and Mobile platforms.With mobiles becoming more 'personal' than the 'personal computer', with 'social networking' becoming the buzz word of todays marketers and with 'location based services' gaining popularity worldwide -a research on the convergence of all the three mediums was essential. This research will provide better insights to marketers, brands and retailers to devise the right strategy for mobile engagement of customers and would definitely become a base for many future reseach in the till now scantly researched field of SoLoMo. I and my co-authors are very confident that our paper will be publishecd in one of the top 10 journals of the world."},{},{},{}]
